message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. Accept and we can call it a day!
Let's meet in the middle and split it 50/50
A bit more to me, but still a good deal for you, Bob. Consider it!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
A bit more towards the middle, Bob. Will you meet me here?
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not going to give up yet
Getting closer, Bob. Can we meet here and call it a day?
I'm not giving up yet, Alice. Let's keep going!
Getting closer to the middle, Bob. Don't be shy, take it!
I'm not backing down, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to give up
Last chance, Bob. Meet me at the middle and we can end this!
